FuncDef: The reset aaa remote-download acl statistics command clears statistics about classifier-behavior pairs dynamically delivered by the RADIUS server.
CLIs: reset aaa remote-download acl statistics [ classifier { <name> | classifier-id <classifier-id> } ] [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a classifier dynamically delivered by the RADIUS server.
The value is a string of 1 to 127 case-sensitive characters.

Specifies a classifier ID dynamically delivered by the RADIUS server.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 16383.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear statistics about classifier-behavior pairs dynamically delivered by the RADIUS server, run the reset aaa remote-download acl statistics command. If a classifier is specified, statistics about classifier-behavior pairs with the specified classifier are cleared. If a slot ID is specified, statistics about classifier-behavior pairs on the specified board are cleared. If both a classifier and a slot ID are specified, statistics about classifier-behavior pairs with the specified classifier on the specified board are cleared.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
Statistics about classifier-behavior pairs dynamically delivered by the RADIUS server cannot be restored after they are cleared. Exercise caution when running this command.
